remarks: Value of the sequence builder function at a successor.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2014.)
statement:
seqp1i.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
seqp1i.2 $e |- N e. Z $.
seqp1i.3 $e |- K = ( N + 1 ) $.
seqp1i.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( seq M ( .+ , F ) ` N ) = A ) $.
seqp1i.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( F ` K ) = B ) $.
seqp1i $p |- ( ph -> ( seq M ( .+ , F ) ` K ) = ( A .+ B ) ) $.
